description: Seychelles is a small island state in the western Indian Ocean. It is an Archipelago comprising more than 115 islands scattered all over an Exclusive Economic Zone of 1.34 sq. Km.  The islands are classify into seven groups depending on their location. The Groups are: Inner Island, Amirantes, Aladabra, Cosmoledo, Farquhar, Coetivy and Alphonse.
name: Seychelles Island Group
